pages.text: If enough $(aura) is present in the environment, so much so that the bar of the $(l:items/eye)Environmental Eye$() is filled up by about half above the regular amount, $(item)Natural Storage$() will start to occur: For any players around a saturated area that carry an $(l:items/aura_cache)Aura Cache$() with them, it will slowly start to $(thing)fill up$(), draining from the oversaturated $(aura).
This effect can be inhibited in a radius of about 30 blocks around the saturated area using $(l:effects/inhibiting_powder)Powder of no Storage$().
